title: Magikoopa

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Block Magic**: Transform someone into a block, Roleblocking, giving Powerful defense to them and Learning their role.
- **Teleport** (2x): Disappear briefly, players targeting you will instead target another player of your choice, this doesn't count as a visit.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - If you are killed, the Koopas will learn the name and role of your killer(s).

desc:
Post 1381
*Magikoopas ride on brooms and fling dangerous spells.*
